azurerm_servicebus_namespace_network_rul.description: Manages a ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set Set.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the Resource Group where the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

namespace_name.description: Specifies the ServiceBus Namespace name to which to attach the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

default_action.description: Specifies the default action for the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set. Possible values are `Allow` and `Deny`. Defaults to `Deny`.

ip_rules.description: One or more IP Addresses, or CIDR Blocks which should be able to access the ServiceBus Namespace.

network_rules.description: One or more `network_rules` blocks as defined below.

subnet_id.description: The Subnet ID which should be able to access this ServiceBus Namespace.

ignore_missing_vnet_service_endpoint.description: Should the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set ignore missing Virtual Network Service Endpoint option in the Subnet? Defaults to `false`.

id.description: The ID of the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set.

create.description: Used when creating the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set.

update.description: Used when updating the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set.

read.description: Used when retrieving the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set.

delete.description: Used when deleting the ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set.
